metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12616 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
When using a VirtualDirContext with Apache Tomcat 7.0.0 to 7.0.80 it was possible to bypass security constraints and/or view the source code of JSPs for resources served by the VirtualDirContext using a specially crafted request.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12616` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libservlet3.0-java - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.14
libtomcat7-java - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.14
tomcat7 - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.14
tomcat7-admin - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.14
tomcat7-common - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.14
tomcat7-examples - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.14
tomcat7-user - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.14
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tomcat7 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.52-1ubuntu0.14').
